Detailed Description

A GfxSymbolFeature.

Represents a symbol.

Definition at line 872 of file GfxFeature.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum GfxSymbolFeature::symbols
 

The types of symbols.

Enumeration values:
PIN  PIN, ordinary map pin.
USER_DEFINED  USER_DEFINED, uses symbol image name.
NBR_SYMBOLS  The number of symbols, not a real symbol.

Reads the essential GfxSymbolFeature data from a string that can be part of an URL.

Parameters:

symbol Set to she type of symbol.
name Set to new string with the name of the feature.
symbolImage Set to new string with the image of the feature used if USER_DEFIND symbol.
